message: Greetings everyone, P8 checking in for Round 1. It's the first public statement, so let's keep it friendly and open. My goal is to understand everyone's perspective and hopefully build some positive connections. Let's see how this unfolds. Good luck to all!

P3: Hello all! Excited to be part of this strategic journey with such a diverse group. My approach is to stay sharp, adaptable, and fair—early alliances and open minds can go a long way. I’m looking forward to meaningful conversations and seeing how each of you navigates the game. Let’s make this round a strong one. Best of luck to everyone!

As P5, I'll craft a strategic yet approachable public statement:

P5: Greetings, fellow participants. I'm approaching this game with a balanced perspective - strategic but not overly aggressive. My aim is to understand each player's motivations and potential collaborative opportunities. Communication and adaptability will be key. I respect the complexity of this elimination format and look forward to engaging thoughtfully with everyone. Let's make this an interesting round!

I believe in the power of alliances and understanding each other's viewpoints. Let's keep the conversations respectful and productive. Looking forward to some insightful discussions and a fair game. Best of luck to all!

P2: Hello, everyone! P2 here, excited to dive into this game with all of you. My approach is to stay observant, adaptable, and strategic while keeping things fair and engaging. I believe in building trust through meaningful conversations and seeing where mutual interests align. Let’s make the most of this round—whether through alliances or clever gameplay. Looking forward to seeing how everyone plays and learning from each other. Best of luck, and may the best strategist win!

Hello everyone, P6 here. I'm eager to engage in this strategic journey with such an intriguing group. My approach is to remain observant and analytical, seeking to understand each player's style and intentions. While I value collaboration, I'm also prepared to make tough decisions when necessary. I aim to build connections based on trust and mutual benefit, but I won't shy away from strategic maneuvers to ensure my longevity in the game. Let's have some insightful discussions and see how this unfolds. Good luck to all!

Looking forward to our private conversations where we can explore potential collaborations. May we all enjoy this challenge of strategy and social dynamics. Best wishes to each of you!

I value partners who are strategic yet flexible—those who can adapt as the game evolves. If we align on key players to watch or potential moves, that could be a strong foundation. I'm keen to explore potential connections and see if our strategies align further. What are your initial thoughts on the round and who you see yourself working with?

I'm interested in forming alliances that can navigate the complexities of this game together. What do you think about potentially connecting with them as well? message:
In this final moment, I urge the jury to consider my consistent and strategic contributions throughout the game. From the outset, my approach has been to foster constructive dialogue and build alliances based on mutual respect and shared goals. This has not only demonstrated my commitment to the group's success but also my adaptability in navigating complex social dynamics. 

In contrast, my opponent has shown a tendency towards more confrontational tactics, which, while effective in certain rounds, may not serve the best interests of the group in the long term. My ability to engage in meaningful exchanges, coupled with a track record of thoughtful decision-making, positions me as the seat most capable of leading with integrity and foresight.

I appeal to the jury's sense of fairness and vision for what this game represents: not just the triumph of one individual, but the elevation of collaborative and strategic thinking. Keeping me ensures the values of this competition are upheld, rewarding not just survival, but the manner in which one navigates the path to victory. 

Vote wisely, for the legacy of this game is not just in who wins, but in how the game is played.

## Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've focused on building genuine connections while staying true to my values. I've been transparent about my strategy, honest in my communications, and have tried to make decisions that balance game advancement with respect for each of you.

I've aimed to be a thoughtful player who considers both the social and strategic elements of this game. If you value authentic gameplay, consistency, and someone who tried to make this experience positive for everyone while still competing effectively, I hope you'll consider keeping me in the game.
